Articles.Content:
Just found this game a few weeks ago, and love it. in the Demo version I was easily able to get the stock craft into a zero inclination 100k standard orbit and safely land with paracutes, all while on Manuel control.

Saddest day so far. Decided to have one of my Kerbalnaughts go EVA before my apoapsis, forgot to do my burn and before he got back onboard we started doing re-entry. Recently I was able to put Kethane Detecting Satellites on Polar orbits on both Mun, and Minmus. Might start building a station and practice docking.

Two minor questions.

1. is it possible to build orbiters or Probes separately from the boosters, and combine both "craft" (save files) in the VAB?

2. Is it possible to dock rovers while on the surface? or perform docking while on the surface?

Hey there, welcome to the KSP community!

1. It is with sub assembly loader (but needs updating I think) http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/subassembly-saver-loader/

2. yes it is! (I will try and find a youtube vid)
